resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ruslan. 

I like to create an application on Android OS. 
My app written on Kotlin 
Kotiln is modern programming language. 
Kotlin is Russian programming language. 
I often dream that I will become android developer and I will work in big company 

I live in Saint-Petersburg. 
I study in the ITMO University. 
I think that ITMO is the best. 

I think that the main thing in life is self-development. Self-development is not as a life stage, but as the meaning of life.
